SERVICES & SKILLS

My name is Kyle and I have been studying front end development, web design and data structures. Below are skills and fields I take work in.

Hire Me

Front End Development

Javascript, SASS, NPM

I am enthusiastic about working with front end web technologies to create vivid and functional websites and web applications.

System Administration

Ubuntu, Windows, Powershell, Terminal

When I am not learning how the web works I am tinkering with operating systems to better understand errors and better optimize my workflow.

Web Development & Web Hosting Services

I enjoy writing about code, workflow optimization, design systems and more.
